â€œI write one song that has a line about make the friendship bracelets in it! and all of sudden i show up this tour, and you guys are making friendship bracelets, trading them and making new friends! and spreading so much joy. Now we come play in New Orleans, and there's a giant friendship bracelet on the outside of this stadium.. thats ALL YOU! Youâ€™ve made this tour into this magnificent display of joy! and thats why Iâ€™ve had honestly more fun on this tour than I could ever have imagined!â€
